celfmt -i src.cel
! stderr .
cmp stdout want.txt

-- src.cel --
state.as(state,
	(
		// First comment line.
		// Second comment line.
		has(state.a) && state.b > 0
	) ?
		state.c
	:
		state.d
)
-- want.txt --
state.as(state,
	(
		// First comment line.
		// Second comment line.
		has(state.a) && state.b > 0
	) ?
		state.c
	:
		state.d
)
